price: (አላህም) «ኢብሊስ ሆይ! በሁለት እጆቼ ለፈጠርኩት ከመስገድ ምን ከለከለህ? (አሁን) ኮራህን? ወይስ (ፊቱኑ) ከትዕቢተኞቹ ነበርክ?» አለው፡፡
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقۡتُ بِيَدَيَّۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَالِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā manaʿaka an tasjuda limā khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-ʿālīna
